name: The Last Warrior Standing
description:
An epic adventure to define... The Last Warrior Standing.
Keyboard controls: AWSD +  X = O, Back = L, L1 = I, R1 = P, L2 = K and R2 = ; (Ñ).

Explore the world of Thails, full of different beings and nations interacting and participating in exciting championships to define... The Last Warrior Standing.

I recommend downloading it, but you can try it here first.

#rpg #strategy #adventure #topdown #pixelart

I have managed to create 20% of the total, but enough to test and work on possible improvements.
